headline: Caterpillar Inc. Enters Into Agreement to Acquire RPMGlobal
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT) today entered into an agreement to acquire RPMGlobal Holdings Limited (ASX: RUL), an Australian-based software company.
